prompts: Create a small, energetic fire-type Pokemon with fluffy features and a playful demeanor.
Show me a cute, bunny-like Pokemon that has fiery accents and loves to jump around.
Imagine a vibrant Pokemon that runs swiftly through grassy fields, leaving a trail of flames.
Design a starter Pokemon that is both adorable and fierce, embodying the spirit of fire.
Generate a bipedal creature with bright orange ears and a fiery tail, ready for a Pokémon battle.
Make an agile Pokemon that uses its speed and fire abilities to outmaneuver opponents in combat.
Give me a lively Pokemon that thrives in sunny environments and inspires warmth wherever it goes.
